*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Ramon Musquiz, Goliad, November 30, 1832. Suggests that the ayuntamiento of Bexar draw up memorial asking for reforms.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Goliad */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-30-1832">November 30th 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Most Esteemed Friend.*/p*
*p*I left *location_mentioned*Austin */location_mentioned*on a visit to your *location_mentioned*City*/location_mentioned*, arrived here *date_mentioned n="11-29-1832">yesterday */date_mentioned*and continue on my way *date_mentioned n="12-01-1832">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento of *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* held no meeting owing to the sickness of its *person_mentioned*members*/person_mentioned*, since the *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned* received the communication about the convention and *person_mentioned*committees*/person_mentioned*: for this reason they have not answered it, I believe that their answer may be delayed somewhat: In the mean time, I see no difficulty in placing the affairs on a footing, that would secure union and harmony throughout *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. It seems that there is at *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*a uniform agreement on the substance of the representation, only some disagreement on the manner of representing. If it is so, it will be easy to settle the difficulty: let *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*take the lead in the matter. In short, the main object of my visit is. to see if there is any means to avoid a dissentment with *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, and the balance of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. This journey is rather troublesome to me, owing as well to the bad condition of the *location_mentioned*roads*/location_mentioned*, as to the danger of *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*, and the loss of time from my private business, but we wish to see harmony prevail in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, as it exists already in substance. The forms are of little importance, and ought not to breed discord, though I believe it will not be difficult to satisfy all parties, and to obtain a unity of action. I shall be with you, a few hours after these lines reach you.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ramon Musquiz*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
